name: Fr05: Fling to Foundry
description: Move a friendly adjacent unit to any? friendly unoccupied foundry
Notes: Should only Frostlon care about foundries as a tile resource (moving to foundries or using them)

name: Si01: Treetop dweller
description: This costs 1 less if deployed in or adjacent to a firendly environ
Notes: Unit, small, cheaper in Simian

name: Si02: Forest Guide
description: Reaction: Leaf Reading: When this enters the field, search your deck or damage for a Simian, reveal it and put it into your hand
Notes: Unit, small, Simian search

name: Si03: Glade Strider
description: Aura: Friendly Territory This unit has +1Mv when in or adjacent to a friendly Simian environ
Notes: Unit, medium, environ move

name: Si04: Treetop Anhillator
description: This costs 1 less if deployed in or adjacent to a friendly environ
Notes: Unit, large, cheaper in Simian

name: Si05: Goragaran
description: This unit can only be deployed on a tile with a friendly environ
Notes: Unit, large, requires Simian

name: Si06: Kyrian Clearing
Notes: Environ, Simian

name: Si07: Simmish Sanctuary
description: Reaction: Emerge from earth: When this enters the field, the next Simian you play this turn costs 1 less
Notes: Environ, Simian, chain Simian

name: Si08: Arborial Pathways
description: Aura: Paths of Grass: You may pay 2 to allow an ally to move through this tile for free.
Notes: Environ, Simian, Free movement

name: Si09: Kyrian Mountainside
description: Aura: Verdance Vigor: Friendly units in this environ gain +2Atk
Notes: Environ, Simian, strength

name: Si10: Call of the forest
description: Search your deck or damage pile for Simian ordnance and reveal it. It costs 1 less when played this turn
Notes: Stratagem, search env, chain Simian

name: Si11: Kyrian Ambush
description: Chosen unit in a friendly environ gets +2Atk +2Def for each adjacent friendly Simian environ
Notes: Tactic, Simian gives Strength

name: G10: Wheel
description: Shuffle your hand into your deck then draw 5 cards. You become fatigued (you can't draw cards or deploy ordnance until your next turn)

name: G 13: Unit Searcher
description: To deploy this, you must also discard 2 cards, then search your deck for a unit, reveal it, and shuffle
Notes: Stratagem, cheap discard 2, search for unit

name: G01: Place Searcher
description: To deploy this, you must also discard 2 cards, then search your deck for an environ or structure, reveal it, and shuffle
Notes: Stratagem, cheap, discard 2, search for env or structure

name: G02: Strategy Searcher
description: To deploy this, you must also discard 2 cards, then search your deck for a tactic or stratagem, reveal it, put it into your hand and shuffle

name: G11: Flow Concentration
description: Search your deck for any card then shuffle. You become fatigued (you can't draw cards or deploy ordnance until your next turn)
Notes:
Stratagem, cheap, fatigue, search for anything
 
 This and CG04 are basically the same effect at the same cost. There needs to be some difference

name: G03: Flow Filtration
description: To deploy this, you must also discard a card. Search your deck and/or damage pile for a card. You become fatigued  (you can't draw cards or deploy ordnance until your next turn)
Notes: Stratagem, cheap, fatigue, search damage pile

name: G04: Trance
description: Draw 4 cards. You become fatigued (you can't draw cards or deploy ordnance until your next turn)
Notes: Stratagem, medium, fatigue, draw 4

name: G05: Epiphany
description: Draw 2 cards. You become fatigued (you can't draw cards or deploy ordnance until your next turn)
Notes: Tactic, fatigue, draw 2

name: G06: Flow Timewind
description: To deploy this, you must also discard a card. Search your deck and/or damage pile for any card.  You take 2 damage, and become fatigued (you can't draw cards or deploy ordnance until your next turn)
Notes: Tactic, fatigue, take 2 damage, search deck and damage for anything

name: G07: Flow Restoration
description: Shuffle the top 6 cards from your damage pile into your deck, then draw a card. You become fatigued (you can't draw cards or deploy ordnance until your next turn)
Notes: Heal 3 draw 1

name: G08: Charge!
description: All Friendly Units have +1 to Movement until the end of your next turn
Notes: Tactic, +1 to movement

name: The Novice
description: You may create a conduit and/or move your wielder once per turn

name: Fire Fist
description: Fire fists Reaction: Whenever you deal damage to an adjacent occupant, deal 2 additional damage
Notes: Fire fists Reaction: Whenever you deal damage to an adjacent occupant, deal 2 additional damage

name: Long Arms
description: Telekine arms: reaction: at the start of a turn you can pay one to deploy nearby you this turn
Notes: Telekine arms: reaction: at the start of a turn you can pay one to deploy nearby you this turn

name: Pupetteer
description: Pupetteer: whenever you destroy 1 or more occupants, you may play 3 life to put a unit that costs 1 or less from your hand adjacent to you
Notes: Pupetteer: whenever you destroy 1 or more occupants, you may play 3 life to put a unit that costs 1 or less from your hand adjacent to you

name: Zetsu Guy
description: Zetsu crush: whenever ordnance deploys within 2 tiles of you, you may discard cards with total cost exactly 2 times the deploying ordnance's cost. If you do discard it without applying it
Notes: Zetsu crush: whenever ordnance deploys within 2 tiles of you, you may discard cards with total cost exactly 2 times the deploying ordnance's cost. If you do discard it without applying it

name: Magnet Man
description: Universal push/pull: Reaction: when you would move this, you may instead pay 3 to move an occupant in a straight line of unoccupied tiles towards you or away from you until it can't move further.
Notes: Universal push/pull: Reaction: when you would move this, you may instead pay 3 to move an occupant in a straight line of unoccupied tiles towards you or away from you until it can't move further.

name: Rally Lady
description: Rallier: whenever 3 or more units adjacent to you attack, those units can't be destroyed this turn
Notes: Rallier: whenever 3 or more units adjacent to you attack, those units can't be destroyed this turn

name: Another Rally Lady
description: Rallier 2: each friendly unit adjacent to you gets +1/+1 for each other unit adjacent to you
Notes: Rallier 2: each friendly unit adjacent to you gets +1/+1 for each other unit adjacent to you

name: Shield Fella
description: Shield barer: Reaction: whenever damage would be dealt to an adjacent occupant, you may deal that damage to you instead
Notes: Shield barer: Reaction: whenever damage would be dealt to an adjacent occupant, you may deal that damage to you instead

name: Walk-in
description: Freezer: pay 3 to freeze a nearby (within 2?) occupant until its attacked unless they/their controller pays 2
Notes: Freezer: pay 3 to freeze a nearby (within 2?) occupant until its attacked unless they/their controller pays 2

name: Blammo-fella
description: Artillery command: Occupants that deal damage to a non-adjacent occupant deal 1 additional damage
Notes: Artillery command: Occupants that deal damage to a non-adjacent occupant deal 1 additional damage

name: Hole digger
description: You Start with 2 black hole counters. Remove a black hole counter to move each occupant adjacent to any chosen tile 1 tile closer to the chosen tile in any order. You deal 1 damage to each occupant that can't move closer.
Notes: You Start with 2 black hole counters. Remove a black hole counter to move each occupant adjacent to any chosen tile 1 tile closer to the chosen tile in any order. You deal 1 damage to each occupant that can't move closer. You become fatigued

name: Swampfolk
description: If adjacent to or in a friendly fen, you may chose a card in your discard and discard 3 cards to put the chosen card into your hand. You become fatigued
Notes: If adjacent to or in a friendly fen, you may chose a card in your discard and discard 3 cards to put the chosen card into your hand. You become fatigued
